channel.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
channel.description: It appears to me to be a portal shooting beams out or something i never quite figured it out any theories? I know its freemans portal [img]https://sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash1/hs525.ash1/30862_119419924765142_100000914046475_101903_3091198_n.jpg[/img] I have no clue what the portal transformed into.

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
The portal decayed into a plot hole. End of thread.

Read full topic
item.source: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
MechUnit:

yes, they would produce their own electrical power (maybe from the lambda core, too) - but for the whole facility AND for creating portals the reactor would be a bit small, i think.

on topic: because it was a nice GFX-effect anno 1998?

You do realize Hoover Dam powers Arizona, Nevada, and good chunk of California?

Read full topic
item.source: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Nightmare470
item.description:
Not to mention i think that shepard and the other HECU marines had blown up part of the damn in order to try to kill a gargunta. And as for the islands moving to slow, let’s not forget that they are in another dimension so it’s possible that your perception of time is off and if it’s an eternal abyss with a large amount of islands, they could be moving very fast and simply because Xen is so big you just can’t tell. In theory anyway

Read full topic
item.source: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

From my understanding they where both completely different portals.

that. They say in game they they use different technology. The older one that Adrian used required a two way communication to get a fix on a location. Hence the antenna on xen that you need to activate to return home. He said that this older technology could work but the portals location is a partially random. The One in the lambda core on the other hand can do some magical mumbojumbo, and can get a fix just from the earth base.

Read full topic
item.source: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Yeah. The whole place was falling apart, everyone was dying etc and the portal became unstable and closed the first portal and opened a second one.

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Payne_and_Redemption
item.description:
That’s a possibility, but why did Gordon’s portal change the second he jumped through? Is it because the teleporter became so unstable that Adrian indeed entered Xen through a second portal?

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Payne_and_Redemption
item.description:
hahahahahahahahahaha came too late hahahahahahahaha
but seriously,if Gordon had jumped through a split second later, he would’ve recieved the same fate Adrian did, falling through space, but I just don’t understand how the portal did that, because the islands move too slow for the portal to be that far away

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Shnazliztur
item.description:
Maybe Shepard could of gone through it if he arrived earlier, because I remember playing HL1 in that teleport chamber and I only had a small time window so to speak to be able to jump through successfully to Xen. So maybe he just came too late.

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: higgsboson
item.description:

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Stargategeek
item.description:
There is only one soultion to why this happend… ALIENS, hey wait… nevermind…

Seriously, I belive as it was said in game the portal could not remain open for much longer, neither, the aliens ransacking the place, could of helped the portal and it must of became unstable and in the process moving the exit portal slightly futher away from the island gordon landed on, also explaining it turning green, spazing out, and made that annoying message appear… Subject: Terminated Reason: Tried to create paradox…

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
Maxey:

The whole facility was built around a hydroelectric power plant, so they could generate all the power they needed without having to take it from the national grid.

yes, they would produce their own electrical power (maybe from the lambda core, too) - but for the whole facility AND for creating portals the reactor would be a bit small, i think.

on topic: because it was a nice GFX-effect anno 1998?

its just shooting out lasers because its a cool effect, and it probably takes a lot of electricity to make that portal. Damn think of the electric bill of black mesa :fffuuu:

The whole facility was built around a hydroelectric power plant, so they could generate all the power they needed without having to take it from the national grid.

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: higgsboson
item.description:
D4RKN3SS:

i cant seem to figure exactly what it transformed into

Seriously WTF are you talking about? It’s a portal that doesn’t transform into anything. Like what the hell would a portal transform into? A camel? A hot dog? An inflatable chihuahua? It’s a portal and Freeman jumps through it to get to Xen. And Adrian can also jump through it if he wants to, and he would also get to Xen. However, he gets teleported like 10 meters further away, so he falls down into the void, killing him.

Read full topic

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Payne_and_Redemption
item.description:
While the islands in Xen do indeed move, it just doesn’t at all seem possible that in the very short amount of time from Freeman jumping through to Shephard jumping through, the island could’ve moved so far away.

Read full topic

item.description:
James.Curse:

Could you try being more clear please? And while you are on that check your grammar please (I am an adolescent from a third world country and I have better grammar than you)?

im from argentina to but mi grammar suks… munkyfucks, xen is 4th world

item.title: What at The Lambda teleport in OP4 right after Freeman jumped in?
item.dc:creator: Nightmare470
item.description:
Don’t the islands in Xen move through it? if that was the case and the exit from the portal to Xen is a static one, then when freeman jumped through the island was passing by, and when shepard jumped through the island had passed and the portal being static didn’t, hence a plummet into a dimensional abyss does seem like a probable outcome?

Read full topic

Second world is Communist countries. Argentina is indeed third world, according to Wikipedia.

Do you know that this kind of classification isn’t valid nowadays, right?
